solution_line_template: Start by taking out the ones he ate: {initial_jelly_beans} ounces - {eaten_jelly_beans} ounces = <<{initial_jelly_beans}-{eaten_jelly_beans}={remaining_jelly_beans}>>{remaining_jelly_beans} ounces.
Divide the remainder equally: {remaining_jelly_beans} ounces / {num_piles} piles = <<{remaining_jelly_beans}/{num_piles}={weight_per_pile}>>{weight_per_pile} ounces per pile.
